cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4 FATAL_ERROR)

if (DEFINED BANG_PHYSX_BUILT)
    return()
endif()
set(BANG_PHYSX_BUILT ON)

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# PROJECT
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

set(PHYSX_ROOT_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})

# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# SUB-DIRECTORIES
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

include_directories("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include")
include_directories("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include")
link_directories("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/lib")

set(PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/src/PhysXMetaData/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/src/PhysXMetaData/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/common/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/common/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/API/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/API/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/software/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle/software/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleDynamics/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleDynamics/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXMetaData/extensions/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXMetaData/extensions/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXMetaData/core/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXMetaData/core/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleAABB/include")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleAABB/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleCloth/include")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicleParticles/src/gpu")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include/foundation")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include/foundation/unix")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/include/cudamanager")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src/foundation/src/unix")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/GeomUtils/src/mesh")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/GeomUtils/src/sweep")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/GeomUtils/src/intersection")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/GeomUtils/src/contact")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtension")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtensions/src")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/File")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelCloth")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelCloth/include")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/collision")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/cooking")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/particles")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/cloth")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/characterkinematic")

list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/gpu")
list(APPEND PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Include/pvd")

# PhysX Library
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXCharacterKinematic")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXVehicle")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXExtensions")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/SceneQuery")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/SimulationController")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/PhysXCooking")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/Common")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevel")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelAABB")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelDynamics")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelCloth")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PhysX_3.4/Source/LowLevelParticles")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src/task")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src/foundation")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src/pvd")
add_subdirectory("${PHYSX_ROOT_DIR}/PxShared/src/fastxml")

target_include_directories(PhysX3                   PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PhysXVehicle             PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PhysX3CharacterKinematic PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PhysX3Extensions         PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(SceneQuery               PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(SimulationController     PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PhysX3Cooking            PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PhysX3Common             PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(LowLevel                 PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(LowLevelAABB             PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(LowLevelDynamics         PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(LowLevelCloth            PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(LowLevelParticles        PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PxTask                   PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PxFoundation             PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PxPvdSDK                 PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_include_directories(PsFastXml                PUBLIC ${PHYSX_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
